data.name: Hariza y Arruyo visita
data.desc: Alcalde of Bacalar-at-Chunhuhub Captain Francisco de Hariza y Arruyo carries out a visita and reaches Tipuj, at which point he sends an embassy to Tah Itza, which was delayed by a military campaign then underway by Capt Juan DÃ­az de Velasco, under Audiencia of Guat authority, but which ultimately proved fruitful
data.agents_sp: Capt Francisco de Hariza y Arruyo, Mateo Uicab
data.prim_n: PATRONATO,237,R.10 [Francisco Harizo to Gov a 7 jul 1695 / Auto by Gov a 7 sep 1695 / Gil de Azamar a Hariza / Gov a Barrios Leal a 1 dic 1695]
data.note: 1695-1696 Tipuj. 21 soldiers stationed there by Capt Hariza, fort built by soldiers [possibly = Str. H12-8] /v Graham 251-252 /v Jones 259-267 /[missg]
